players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "That's a lie, Bob. I investigated Diana last night and she was the mafioso. Why are you trying to frame me?"
Bob: "Alice, vote Charlie with me. He's lying about investigating Diana since she was killed by mafia. Only mafia would claim to investigate a dead player."
You: "I think Bob's investigation is more credible. Charlie might be framing us to protect himself."
Charlie: "Bob is clearly lying. If I were mafia, why would I claim to investigate Diana when she's dead? That makes no sense. Bob's story is fabricated to eliminate a town member."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
